Top menu


Items in the top menu are :

  • files : to choose a file in the document directory. See

    Data files

     for more.
  • examples : to show the various capabilites of ioda.
  • clear : to clear the viewing scene.
  • reset : to reset the viewing scene camera with the parameters used when the scene had been created.
  • out.jpg : produce a jpeg file of what is viewed. According to the platform, the output directory is :
    • UNIX : ~/Documents/ioda
    • Windows : C:\Documents and Settings\user\Documents\ioda
    • Android : /sdcard/Android/data/fr.in2p3.lal.ioda
    • iOS : app_dir/Documents.
  • help : some help texts coming with the application.
  • infos : view various infos as the document directory, the output directory, the "pwd" at startup, etc...
  • exit : (desktop) : exit the application. For Android and iOS, use the device exit/home button.
